subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jon Merrill put the Devils ahead against the Wild with his first goal of the season, and the Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin scored his 500th and 501st goals to become the 43rd N.H.L. player to reach the milestone.
snippet: Jon Merrill put the Devils ahead against the Wild with his first goal of the season, and the Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin scored his 500th and 501st goals to become the 43rd N.H.L. player to reach the milestone.
